name: Interactive Medieval Town
description:
This project is the first run-through of a simulated town and one of my portfolio pieces. This town has multiple different Npcs with different quests for the player to access.  The user can walk around in the world and interact with the items found in it. Uses Unity content such as particle effects, Cinemachine, and Dialogue System.  There are multiple different items involved within the progression of quests and both main questlines invoke the theme of a town being tied down by multiple sides. Controls are WASD to move, Tab to use inventory, and Spacebar to interact with the NPCs.

Credits:

 EmaceArt- Medieval Slavic Village Models and Prefabs

Snowforge - Necklace model
